thread.title: WhatsApp, Facebook Driving Internet Use in India, Micromax Co-Founder Says
thread.title_full: WhatsApp, Facebook Driving Internet Use in India, Micromax Co-Founder Says - WSJ

author: Alistair Barr
title: WhatsApp, Facebook Driving Internet Use in India, Micromax Co-Founder Says
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif.â€”Facebook Inc. and its messaging app WhatsApp are the main drivers of booming Internet use in India, Vikas Jain, co-founder of Indian smartphone maker Micromax Informatics Ltd., said at the WSJDLive technology conference on Wednesday.
Unlike some rivals, Micromax isn't interested in making and promoting its own apps and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
